company_info.Company Description: Dear Candidate,We are having our offices in kolkata and Mumbai and Kolkata is our main office. It is a tours and travels company working on the Worldwide tourism. The Job Profile is the promotion and Advertising of the Company services on online and Offline basis.

jd_information.description: Dear Candidate,Let The Internet Earn You an Income. At your Suitable time from Your Potential. The Work is to Promote Worldwide Travel & Tourism With the Help of Free Online Tools. The List Of Web Sites and Other tools will be Provided by the Company. This Job Can Be Done On Full Time and Part-time basis too. You Can Start This Job from Any Part of India, where Infrastructure is Available. (like Computer / Laptop and Internet).For More Details Contact us.Reagards,LaxmikantSenior Executive
